item.title: Liz add a quote by Joshilyn Jackson
item.description: "There are gods in Alabama: Jack Daniel's, high school quarterbacks, trucks, big tits, and also Jesus." -- Joshilyn Jackson

item.title: Liz add a quote by Leo Tolstoy
item.description: "All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way." -- Leo Tolstoy

item.title: Liz add a quote by Reynolds Price
item.description: "Almost all of my really good times have been silent but have had to end." -- Reynolds Price

item.title: Liz add a quote by Bill Bryson
item.description: "Beulah has a husband?' I know. It's a miracle. There can't be more than two people on the planet who'd be willing to sleep with her, and here we are both in the same town." -- Bill Bryson

item.title: Liz add a quote by E. M. Forster
item.description: "Only connect the prose and the passion, and both will be exalted, and human love will be seen at its highest. Live in fragments no longer." -- E. M. Forster

item.title: Liz add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Liz add a quote by George Eliot
item.description: "It is very hard to say the exact truth, even about your own immediate feelings â€“ much harder than to say something fine about them which is not the exact truth." -- George Eliot

item.title: Liz add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "There seems a general wish of decrying the capacity and undervaluing the labor of the novelist, and of slighting performances which have only genius, wit and taste to recommend them." -- Jane Austen
